'''Ginkaku''' is an event-exclusive NPC that appears in the [[Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival]] event. It is close with [[Kinkaku]] and [[Tetsunosuke]].

==Profile==

===Appearance===
Ginkaku is a gray-colored tanuki with dark brown markings. It has a green leaf on its head and a dark blue bag tied around its neck.
